overview:
James is the principle for Seattle IT Edge, a consultancy focused on 2,3 and 5 year business technical strategy planning.

As of 2012 he has 21 years in the IT business working with businesses and non-profits of every size. His client list has included Microsoft, Chase, Intuit, Smith Barney and the City of Seattle. In addition to Fortune 500 companies he has worked with 100’s of entreprenurial, small, medium and large companies in the Puget Sound and California.

With 21 years of IT experience James is a Seattle IT Consultant focused on the business model within IT departments. Often a re-organization of the IT teams can double the effectiveness of the IT department.
